title: Werewolves of the ancient world
itunes:title: Werewolves of the ancient world
itunes:subtitle: Daniel Ogden explores the origins of the werewolf legend in stories from ancient Greece and Rome.
description:
Historian Daniel Ogden, author of new book The Werewolf in the Ancient World, explores the origins of the werewolf legend in stories from classical Greece and Rome.

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
